key.name: countdown
key.description: Set to true to show a countdown before taking a photo

key.name: countdown-duration
key.description: The duration of the countdown before taking a photo, in seconds

key.name: flash
key.summary: Fire flash before taking a photo
key.description: Set to true to fire a flash before taking a photo

key.name: camera
key.description: The path to the device node which points to the camera, for example /dev/video0

key.name: selected-effect
key.description: Name of the installed effect that was selected last

key.name: photo-x-resolution
key.description: The width of the image captured from the camera, in pixels

key.name: photo-y-resolution
key.description: The height of the image captured from the camera, in pixels

key.name: video-x-resolution
key.description: The width of the video captured from the camera, in pixels

key.name: video-y-resolution
key.description: The height of the video captured from the camera, in pixels

key.name: brightness
key.description: Adjusts the brightness of the image coming from the camera

key.name: contrast
key.description: Adjusts the contrast of the image coming from the camera

key.name: saturation
key.description: Adjusts the saturation of the image coming from the camera

key.name: hue
key.description: Adjusts the hue (color tint) of the image coming from the camera

key.name: video-path
key.description: Defines the path where the videos are stored. If empty, “XDG_VIDEOS_DIR/Webcam” will be used.

key.name: photo-path
key.description: Defines the path where the photos are stored. If empty, “XDG_PICTURES_DIR/Webcam” will be used.

key.name: burst-delay
key.summary: Time between photos in burst mode
key.description: The length of time, in milliseconds, to delay between taking each photo in a burst sequence of photos. If the burst delay is less than the countdown duration, the countdown duration will be used instead.

key.name: burst-repeat
key.summary: Number of photos in burst mode
key.description: The number of photos to take in a single burst.
